name: The Raining Mister Elephant
description:
This is a Limited Edition ORIGINAL painting #91


Size- 20"x20"x1 1/2"

Hand painted with acrylic paints then sealed with a non toxic UV sealer. The painting is also gallery wrapped, so there is no need to frame. A sawtooth hanger is on the back for easy hanging along with a BIO of Marnie V.

Macey is a top a giant elephant who squirts out rainbow colored drops. Her umbrella catches the rain as she dances on his back. The background is painted with light grasshopper green that balances the bright colored drops. Great painting and super cute to add anywhere you choose.

Ships UPS within 2-4 days of receiving payment. Placed into a clear bag, then wrapped in craft paper, and carefully placed into a box.

Signed, numbered, and dated by Marnie V.

Enjoy!

name: Name Banners
description:
This is a CUSTOM name banner with as many letter tiles in it as you need and 2 character tiles. Their is also an option for letter tiles ONLY, that's with NO characters. Please make sure you are selecting the correct amount of letters with this listing.

This item has FREE SHIPPING to US residents ONLY!

This item is made completely CUSTOM for you by Marnie V. The wooden tiles are made out of 100% reclaimed and chemical free wood. They are strung together by hemp string. Painted with acrylic paints then sealed with a non toxic non yellowing UV sealer. These can also be hung anywhere. On walls, drawers with knobs, bathrooms, or anywhere you need some cuteness:)

Wood tile size is 3 1/2"x 3 1/2"x 1/4"
String length- After tiles are added, there is an extra 15"s on each end for hanging.

Cost per tile:
Letter- $6
Character- $14

Here's how to order. In the message to seller, tell me the name you want first. Then break down each tile by the letter and tell me the color you want for that tile. Same with the characters, tell me the name and color. The letters are painted in a dark brown, if you black or a different color, tell me that also. Otherwise they will be dark brown. The names also look the cutest with lower case letters on all. Please specify if you want upper or lower on any. Example order below:

Name - Jack / squirrel-tea green j-orange a-baby blue c-red
k-pale yellow owl-true blue
Please specify also what color lettering you would like. NEW Gold Leaf, dark brown, or any other color on the wheel. If you don't specify, I will give you dark brown lettering.


Suggestions- To create a modern look, mix bright and light colors together within the banner..see sample pictures. Also, if you want a dark tile such as dark brown, place a character on it. The letters are painted in a dark brown and will not show up on a dark brown or dark green tile.

Please contact me with any other questions or comments.

This item will take up to two weeks to create and will ship UPS no later than two weeks from ordering. You'll receive a tracking number when from UPS when shipped. Placed in a clear bag then placed in a box with added paper for protection.

Signed and dated by Marnie V.

Enjoy!

Ships UPS wihin 2-3 weeks of receiving payment. Placed into a bag then wrapped in sturdy craft paper for protection. Then carefully placed into a box and off it goes:).

Enjoy!

name: Bear Family
description:
This hand-painted original on 100% reclaimed canvas is a must have and limited edition of #250. 

A cream background creates a natural feel to this bright modern bear family. Very cute painting to add in any room.

Recycled watercolor paper is painted and then ripped to create leaves for the trees.
Acrylic and watercolor paint are used in this piece. A cool addition for any room. Comes ready to hang with a sawtooth hanger and attached Bio on the back.

name: Celebrate Love- PRINT
description:
Printed on my EPSON R2880 printer!
Archival Inks!!!!
Image measures 8x10" printed on 8 1/2x 11" paper and centered in the middle, leaving a white crisp margin...perfect for framing.
This print is gorgeous...looking just like the original.
Printed on beautiful Hahnemuhle Museum Etching Paper: 350 gsm, Natural White, 100% rag, acid free, no brighteners; printed with archival pigment inks.

This Print is an Open Edition from my ORIGINAL painting- Celebrate Love

All prints are shipped USPS in a clear plastic sleeve and placed between two sturdy pieces of cardboard. Then placed into a stiff bubbled mailer. I send my prints off to their happy new home within 2-3 days of payment. This print will come signed and dated in the lower right hand corner.
Enjoy! - Marnie V.

name: Mod Owl Spring
description:
Hand-painted on 100% reclaimed canvas with acrylic paints, these bright mod trees are too cute. Perched on a branch is an Owl looking bright eyed and curious. This is my Spring tree out of the series.

FREE SHIPPING TO US RESIDENTS ONLY!!
Each tree represents a different season for you to enjoy. Modern design and rich color that can fit in a number of different decors. Pick your favorite season or collect all four and group together on a wall. What a way to start teaching your little ones the four seasons.

The size of this painting is 12x12" with 1 1/2" depth size and is gallery wrapped ready to hang with an attached sawtooth hanger on the back.

This is an ORIGINAL painting with a limited edition of #250.

Signed and dated by Marnie V. with an attached Bio about the artist on the back. Then sealed with a non yellowing non toxic low VOC UV sealer.
